title: How to Open Two Beer Bottles With Each Other

steps.title: Take two beer bottles.
steps.content: Take two beer bottles. Place the first bottle on the table.

steps.title: Take the first bottle and hold it around the neck.
steps.content: Take the first bottle and hold it around the neck.

steps.title: Take the second bottle and hold it around the bottom of its neck.
steps.content: Take the second bottle and hold it around the bottom of its neck.

steps.title: Turn the second bottle upside down, with the bottle cap facing the table.
steps.content: Turn the second bottle upside down, with the bottle cap facing the table.

steps.title: Place the corner or lip of the second bottle’s cap under the edge of the cap on the first.
steps.content: Place the corner or lip of the second bottle’s cap under the edge of the cap on the first. Make sure that you are holding the bottles tight.

steps.title: Use pressure to release the cap of the first bottle.
steps.content: Use pressure to release the cap of the first bottle.

steps.title: Take the other bottle and hook the bottle cap on the one you just opened.
steps.content: Take the other bottle and hook the bottle cap on the one you just opened. Just hook the bottle cap on the edge of the opening of the bottle.

steps.title: Press down to open the bottle.
steps.content: Press down to open the bottle.
